gridSize.name: Grid Size
gridSize.hint: The size to set the grid to when using the Quick Grid Align app. This value is not important for the purpose of aligning the grid, but it will determine the scale of UI elements on the canvas for that particular scene.

quick-grid-align-app.title: Quick Grid Align
quick-grid-align-app.currentGrid: The current grid type is set as
quick-grid-align-app.hexInfo: For hex grids, when counting hexes, in the event that the number of hexes is decimal (e.g. 20 and a half hexes), make sure to input the decimal amount of hexes (e.g. 20.5).
